page.title: 18Life Styles
page.content: I live in Avebury Manor. At 7.15 each morning my Dad gets me up. I go to the bathroom and get dressed and make my Mum a cup of tea. My Mum gets up at 8 o'clock and makes Neville and me breakfast. By this time my Dad is at his business. My Mum takes Nev and me over to school.At school we work very hard. After school the gardener often takes us home. When we get home Neville and me go out on our bikes although sometimes we play with my swingball, after that its time for tea. We watch television while we eat our food with my Mum and Dad. When my sister Cherie and brother Simon come home Mum and Dad sometimes take us swimming in Marlborough. Often they take us to play tennis in Marlborough. It is great fun when my sister and brother come home because they take us on long bike rides.
